SELECT ui.user_code_id AS user_code_id, ui.user_id AS user_id, NULL AS user_code_reg_at, ui.user_email AS user_email, ui.user_pwd AS user_pwd, ui.user_name AS user_name, ui.user_ssn1 AS user_ssn1, ui.user_ssn2 AS user_ssn2, ui.user_tel AS user_tel, ui.user_postal_addr AS user_postal_addr, ui.user_addr AS user_addr, ui.user_detailed_addr AS user_detailed_addr, ui.user_nick_name AS user_nick_name, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM USER_BAN b WHERE b.USER_CODE_ID1 = ui.user_code_id
